descriptionHtml:
Introduces a new class to Skyrim!

-------
NOTE:

I plan to expand on this mod quite a bit. Some ideas for this mod include;
[list]
[*]Brand new faction for the race.
[*]Brand new faction headquaters.
[*]A new Guardian Stone located somewhere near the the first three you encounter (Mage, Thief, Warrior). What it does is still being thought of.
[*]Tame beasts.
[*]New talent tree.
[*]Extra damage against beasts.
[/list]
--------
Currently Working On:

Talent Tree / Perks.
Tamable Beast (Would be a final perk for the perk tree)
Considering the Guardian Stone.
--------

I\'d love to expand this mod more than just that, so throw down some ideas.

I plan to make a Demon Hunter class in future as well. I hope there are some \'more mobs\' mods out in Skyrimnexus and in the workshop here to further increase that class.

This shouldn\'t conflict with any other mods, just subscribe and enjoy.

The class does include;
- Resistance to poisons and diseases.
- Hunters also regenerate stamina and health faster, and also run faster, but their magicka regeneration is decreased.
- Increased mastery in Archery, One-Handed and light armor.

Again, feel free to leave suggestions!

If there are any issues, leave a comment and I\'ll respond as soon as I can.

If you\'d like to expand on my class with me, contact me.

Enjoy! :D

Steam Workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=72372780&searchtext=
author: ChunkyTomatoFTW
